name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularOpenGaugeSimpleText
desc: A template for displaying text inside an open gauge, with a single piece of text for the gauge.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, bottomTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template with an open circular gauge, a small text element at the bottom, and a larger text element in the center.

items.name: var centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the center of the gauge.

items.name: var bottomTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display at the bottom of the gauge.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.
